npcs.name: Mirror Monk
npcs.description: Robed figure whose skin shimmers with embedded glass

dialogue.text: Your skin refracts. The angle has chosen you.
Light burns in your veins. You carry the storm's fire.
The storm speaks through your flesh. Listen.
You walk unmarked. The storm has not yet spoken to you.

npcs.name: Sand-Engineer
npcs.description: Weathered mechanic with goggles and tool-laden belt

dialogue.text: Saltblood, eh? Useful. Glass won't cut you.
Adapted, I see. Stay useful, stay alive.
Fresh meat. Watch where you step—glass cuts deep.

npcs.name: Glassborn
npcs.description: Humanoid form of fused glass and crystallized flesh

dialogue.text: You begin to understand. The shimmer is not pain—it is becoming.
You flinch at the shimmer. We were born in it.
Unmarked flesh. The storm will teach you, or break you.

npcs.name: Salt Hermit
npcs.description: Weathered figure caked in crystalline deposits

dialogue.text: More salt than flesh now. Good. The steppe accepts you.
Saltblood... you'll survive. Maybe.
Another soft one. The storms will harden you or bury you.

npcs.name: Dying Pilgrim
npcs.description: Collapsed traveler, breath shallow, eyes fixed on the horizon

dialogue.text: You glow... like the saints did... before the Heliograph fell...
The angle... I saw it once... in the Crucible... Vex knew...
Water... no... too late... find the Archive... the truth is there...

npcs.name: Glassborn Merchant
npcs.description: Crystalline trader with wares embedded in translucent flesh

dialogue.text: Kin. My prices reflect our bond. Take what you need.
Changing, but not yet changed. I trade with the becoming.
Soft-skin wants glass-goods? Pay double. You haven't earned trust.

npcs.name: Archive Custodian
npcs.description: Half-machine figure, face a cracked screen displaying static

dialogue.text: CREDENTIAL VALID. ACCESS GRANTED. QUERY PERMITTED.
BIOLOGICAL DEVIATION DETECTED. QUARANTINE RECOMMENDED.
UNAUTHORIZED ENTITY. PRESENT VALID CREDENTIAL OR VACATE.
